author: rjmholt
body:
Failure occurs at:

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/d9c2e0e712361bd91f661f6bf6a010c01d2eac0a/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Core/Import-Module.Tests.ps1#L247-L249

With message:

```
Cannot bind argument to parameter 'Path' because it is null.
```
title: PSScheduledJob not loaded from ModuleBase before GAC on Server 2016
